about_the_game:
Welcome to Holy Shoot!

Down the centuries 7 sacred artifacts from ancient cultures had protected the earth from evil. A secret organization called The Sanctum had preserved peace by ensuring these holy items were safe from the sticky fingers of demon spawn.

But such was fate that all peaceful periods must one day come to an end. And so it was that one day all hell let loose! Just when life seemed tickety-boo, everything went crazy! It was no more ice cream in the sun and reading comics. Some serious stuff was going down!

The Sanctum phone starts ringing constantly…



“Headquarters here. What the hell is going on? A horde of demons has stolen the Seven Sacred Artifacts and now they are pouring onto earth through rifts! What the heck are you doing about it? This is a PR nightmare! I need you to get a team together with all the weapons you can muster. Then get down to Hell and get the Artifacts back!”

A Special Ops crack unit of Sanctum Warriors arm themselves and prepare for war. Along the way, legendary heroes known as ghost knights are going to lend a hand. Plus, they have the magical artifacts to banish the demons back to hell.

Hell is packed to the brim with demons including 7 mean demon bosses! Those demons aren’t about to surrender the Artifacts easily. It is going to be a full-on battle for the most sacred objects on earth!

This is a fast, furious, and very funny battle between trained warriors of the Sanctum and the sucky demons. Get ready to kick demon arse and gain angelic powers you never knew you had!



In Holy Shoot, the player embarks on a journey as a member of The Sanctum. The ultimate goal is to defeat the powerful demons that represent the Seven Deadly Sins. Each character, touched by an angel, is granted unique abilities and traits that make them valuable assets in the fight against these demonic forces.

  • Choose a character to play as, each with a unique backstory, abilities, and angelic affiliations.
  • Explore various environments and locations of hell
  • Engage in combat with various demonic enemies, using their unique abilities.
  • Solve puzzles and overcome obstacles to progress through the levels.
  • Face off against powerful bosses representing the Seven Deadly Sins, each with their own unique abilities, strengths, and weaknesses.
  • Restore order by defeating demons, saving innocent souls, and completing puzzles.
  • Level up and unlock core upgrades and branches to enhance abilities, tailoring their playstyle to suit the player's preferences.
  • Discover the story behind each warrior and their angelic connection, as well as The Sanctum's mission and purpose.
  • Progress through the game, uncover the truth behind the demonic invasion and learn more about the characters' personal stories, ultimately leading to a climactic confrontation with the final boss.

It's time to go to Hell!
